title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 611.4 - Certification of attorneys
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 611.4 - Certification of attorneys

State Regulations

Certification of an attorney as a
member of any panel of the Attorneys for Children Plan shall be for a one-year
term subject to: (a) annual redesignation pursuant to Family Court Act, section 244(b); and
(b) recertification as directed by the justices of the Appellate Division, First

Department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
611.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
